Description: The timestamp, in milliseconds, when the member's profile was last edited.
A short-form text area describing how the member approaches proposals.
A short-form text area listing the various associations the member is a part of.
A short-form text area describing the member's interests.
An object representing the various publications associated with the member.  See Publication Fields for a description of the fields available within this object.
An object representing the various patents associated with the member.  See Patent Fields for a description of the fields available within this object.
An object representing the languages that the member knows.  See Language Fields for a description of the fields available within this object.
An object representing the skills that the member holds.  See Skill Fields for a description of the fields available within this object.
An object representing the certifications that the member holds.  See Certification Fields for a description of the fields available within this object.
An object representing the user's educational background.  See Education Fields for a description of the fields available within this object.
An object representing courses the member has taken.  See Course Fields for a description of the fields available within this object.
An object representing the member's volunteer experience.  See Volunteer Fields for a description of the fields available within this object.
A collection of current positions that the member holds, capped at three.  See Position Fields for a description of the fields available within this object.
A collection of the most recent past positions that the member held, capped at three.  See Position Fields for a description of the fields available within this object.
The number of recommendations that the member has.
An object representing the recommendations that the member has received.  See Recommendation Fields for a description of the fields available within this object.
An collection of people, company and industries that the member is following.
A collection of jobs that the member is following.
A collection of people, companies and industries suggested for the member to follow.
The member's date of birth.Â  This field may not return the year as part of the date, if the member has not provided it.
An object representing the URLs the member has shared on their LinkedIn profile.
An object listing related member profiles that were viewed before or after the member's profile.
An object representing the various honors and awards the member has received.
